subject: Design
subcategory: Famous Logos and Their Hidden Stories
title: Chanel: Interlocking Elegance
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Chanel: Interlocking Elegance.

hook.text: Two interlocking C's. No color, no decoration. Chanel's logo is luxury through restraint.

buildup.text: Coco Chanel designed the logo herself in 1925 â€” her initials mirroring each other.

discovery.text: The symmetry suggests balance and harmony. The simplicity signals confidence.

twist.text: Unlike most fashion logos, it has never been redesigned. A century of consistency built its power.

climax.text: Chanel proved that a logo's value comes from restraint, not from flashy redesigns.

punchline.text: True luxury is knowing when to stop designing.
